Name: Maximize Project Completion Rate
Description: Ensure projects finish on or before the planned Project End date

Name: Minimize Budget Overrun
Description: Keep project budget utilization within limits

Name: Maximize Team Velocity
Description: Increase average story points completed per sprint

Name: Maximize Skill Coverage
Description: Ensure team members have skills required for assigned tasks

Name: Minimize Blocker Incidents
Description: Reduce number of blockers/problems during tasks

Name: Maximize Stakeholder Satisfaction
Description: Ensure stakeholders participate and provide positive feedback in Sprint Reviews

Name: Minimize Task Effort Variation
Description: Balance workload across tasks to avoid bottlenecks

Name: Maximize Team Stability
Description: Minimize changes in team composition during a project

Name: Maximize Documentation Quality
Description: Maintain up-to-date feature documentation and change logs
